actions.prompt: Create a 5 sentence of the position, focus on the key matches to my role and anything that stands out as a key miss:
actions.title: Job Summary

actions.prompt: Quick fit match for the job position. DO NOT CREATE A COVER LETTER:
actions.title: Fit Match

actions.prompt:
USE A THINKING MODEL. Think longer, be critical, and provide a more in-depth fit match for the job posting. Have the following sections:
0 - Location & Salary may sure this is a remote job or a job in southeast michigan. If the top salary range is below $190K USD be sure to flag that.
1. Fit Score - ranking 1.0 - 10.0 of how closely my qualifications match this position
2. Strengths - list top 5-8 items where I most accurately match the job posting
3. Gaps - list the key areas where I don't match the job posting. 
4. Gap to Fit - list how I can adjust my resume to improve my fit. Be creative, use high-tech and jargon words, keep the sentences brief.
actions.title: Critical Match

actions.prompt: Create a summary of the company found in the text, keep it short to 5 sentences:
actions.title: Company Summary

actions.prompt: provide a summary of what this company does and their revenue:
actions.title: Company Review

actions.prompt: Create 5 year post and 5 year future revenue projection of the company listed in this post. No need to provide justifications:
actions.title: Company Revenue

actions.prompt: Summarize the following text in 3 or fewer sentences:
actions.title: Summarize
